goal.ch: 縱觀國內社會人心對中國哲學之重視及學習意願有逐年下降之頃向，其原因主要來自於經濟社會之現實要求，以致於造成一般人偏頗地一味追求職業技能，而忽略了思想涵養學習之重要性。鑑此，本課程之教學目標旨在藉由孟子經典之深入研究，以建立起學生對於孟子思想有更整體而系統之掌握，從而在此基礎研究下，幫助學生在後續宋明理學及東亞儒學之系統學習中有更清楚之思想脈絡。
goal.en: Taiwanese tend to value Chinese philosophy less, and people‘s willingness to learn it tends to decline year by year. The chief reason is because of the realistic request from the economic society, which makes people in general pursue only vocational skills and ignore the importance of learning thought and self-restraint. In view of this, the teaching objective of the course focuses on in-depth research into Mencius‘ classics to help students have a more complete and systematic command of Mencius‘ thought. Moreover, based on the basic studies, the course helps students have clearer thinking context for the systematic learning of the Neo-Confucianism in the Song and Ming Dynasties and of East Asian Confucianism.

outline.ch: 為達到預設之教學目標，本課程在內容之規畫上，首先將圍繞孟子義利之辨、善惡之辨、王霸之辨作較精確之討論，之後再就此三辨所延伸出之心性論、工夫論、政治思想等議題做進一步之建構及批判。
outline.en: To achieve the preset teaching objective, the content of the course encircles Mencius‘ discrimination of righteousness and benefit, discrimination of good and evil, and discrimination of a king and despot to carry out more precise discussions about these three types of discrimination. Next, the course guides students to further construct  and criticize Temperament Theory, Skill Theory, political thought and other issues derived from the three types of discrimination.
